The lyrics of this song are not so much kind as they are really strong.
So there are some parts that really hit me hard for a moment.

I think the part about the smiling, silly girl is not about a girl who is happy and having a good time, but about a girl who is just trying to be a friend to someone who is smiling and having a good time.
I'm not saying that a girl who is happy and smiling is stupid, but that a girl who is smiling and laughing is stupid because she matches her friends' and loved ones' tastes.
She goes along with her friends, her significant other, her tastes...
Like, you're not yourself, you're not the real you.
